segment.source: Detecting Network Changes that Affect MED-V
segment.target: Detecting Network Changes that Affect MED-V

segment.source: Detecting Network Changes that Affect MED-V
segment.target: Detecting Network Changes that Affect MED-V

segment.source: Detecting Network Changes that Affect MED-V
segment.target: Detecting Network Changes that Affect MED-V

segment.source: The Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 solution lets you configure your environment to detect certain network changes that might occur after MED-V workspaces are deployed and that can affect MED-V.
segment.target: The Microsoft Enterprise Desktop Virtualization (MED-V) 2.0 solution lets you configure your environment to detect certain network changes that might occur after MED-V workspaces are deployed and that can affect MED-V.

segment.source: The feature includes a component running in the guest operating system that is notified of network configuration changes on the host computer.
segment.target: The feature includes a component running in the guest operating system that is notified of network configuration changes on the host computer.

segment.source: It allows a non-Microsoft ESD or other application that is running in the guest to resolve to the same network endpoints that the host ESD or application resolves to.
segment.target: It allows a non-Microsoft ESD or other application that is running in the guest to resolve to the same network endpoints that the host ESD or application resolves to.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: This feature is only available if the virtual machine is configured for network address translation (NAT) mode.
segment.target: This feature is only available if the virtual machine is configured for network address translation (NAT) mode.

segment.source: If the virtual machine is configured for BRIDGED mode, no change indications are generated.
segment.target: If the virtual machine is configured for BRIDGED mode, no change indications are generated.

segment.source: This section provides information and instruction to assist you in monitoring those network changes that can affect MED-V.
segment.target: This section provides information and instruction to assist you in monitoring those network changes that can affect MED-V.

segment.source: To detect network changes for MED-V
segment.target: To detect network changes for MED-V

segment.source: After you have deployed your MED-V workspaces, you can monitor changes to certain network configurations by preforming the following tasks:
segment.target: After you have deployed your MED-V workspaces, you can monitor changes to certain network configurations by preforming the following tasks:

segment.source: Create a Managed Object Format (MOF) file that will look for the network configuration changes that you want to monitor.
segment.target: Create a Managed Object Format (MOF) file that will look for the network configuration changes that you want to monitor.

segment.source: The following code shows an example of the MOF file that you can create.
segment.target: The following code shows an example of the MOF file that you can create.

segment.source: Compile the MOF file.
segment.target: Compile the MOF file.

segment.source: Install the MOF file in the guest.
segment.target: Install the MOF file in the guest.

segment.source: After you have installed the MOF file, you can create an event subscription that subscribes to Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) creation, modification, or deletion events for the CCMNetworkAdapters class.
segment.target: After you have installed the MOF file, you can create an event subscription that subscribes to Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) creation, modification, or deletion events for the CCMNetworkAdapters class.

segment.source: This detects the following changes to the host:
segment.target: This detects the following changes to the host:

segment.source: Are there any configuration changes to the network, such as changes to the IP address or network adapter?
segment.target: Are there any configuration changes to the network, such as changes to the IP address or network adapter?

segment.source: Is the network available or unavailable?
segment.target: Is the network available or unavailable?

segment.source: Was the network setup changed from BRIDGED mode to NAT mode?
segment.target: Was the network setup changed from BRIDGED mode to NAT mode?

segment.source: Was the network setup changed from NAT mode to BRIDGED mode?
segment.target: Was the network setup changed from NAT mode to BRIDGED mode?

segment.source: A MED-V component on the host monitors the network for these changes and then signals the guest of the change.
segment.target: A MED-V component on the host monitors the network for these changes and then signals the guest of the change.

segment.source: A component in the guest creates a WMI instance to monitor the MED-V workspace for these changes.
segment.target: A component in the guest creates a WMI instance to monitor the MED-V workspace for these changes.

segment.source: The event subscription you created provides notification through the WMI system when one or more of these network changes – creation, modification, or deletion – occurs.
segment.target: The event subscription you created provides notification through the WMI system when one or more of these network changes – creation, modification, or deletion – occurs.
